snippet: Workers in 10 states will get a raise this year, but a long overdue increase in the federal minimum wage would help many more.
abstract: Editorial calls on Congress to raise the federal minimum wage above $7.25 per hour, level that was established in 2009; argues state efforts to raise minimums are no substitute for federal action.
lead_paragraph: Workers in 10 states will get a raise this year, but a long overdue increase in the federal minimum wage would help many more.

headline.seo: Meanwhile, at the Bottom of the Wage Scale
headline.main: And at the Bottom of the Wage Scale ...
headline.print_headline: And at the Bottom of the Wage Scale...
